评论概述: Great office shoe for the price
评论详情: I received this shoe in a light grey as a gift. It was so comfortable and got many compliments at the office that I ended up buying myself a pair in black. 评论概述: Stylish as heck, comfort is lacking
评论详情: So I really wanted to try out the "Cole Hann" look but wasn't sure if I wanted to drop 90-140 for a pair of those, and for the price I was really excited to try these. Reviewers seemed to think they were really comfortable but I should have known better than to expect much at this price. I've since swapped out the soles for some Dr Scholls but even those have their own issues.  On the pro side, the shoe fits really well around the ankle, it looks really good, it breathes well- and after a month and a half it isn't falling apart just yet. So there's that! I get a lot of compliments on them.  I usually have trouble with shoe comfort, and I almost wish I could walk barefoot everywhere because that feels fine but the default sole in these caused pain in my arches where the Dr. Scholls don't. I'm going to have to shop around for some inlays that work better- but I wonder how much is the inlay and how much is the shoes design, with the Scholls, the ball of my foot near my pinky toe kind of gets sore and worn.  I also had to return the size I got originally because it was too small, and even with the size up I wonder if I should have went one size larger. The tags at the back bug me sometimes depending on the socks im wearing, wish those were less pressed up against my heel.
I gave these to a family member and he said he loves them and they are very comfortable and he wears them everywhere.
Ésto zapatos son excelentes, estoy impresionado con su comodidad.

These knit mesh "breathable" shoes are very comfortable and look great. However, I find that my feet sweat even more when wearing them, which is disappointing given the "breathable" claim. If you’re looking for style and comfort, they’re great. But if you tend to sweat a lot, these might not be the best choice.

These sneakers are great. I bought them for a trade show and put 40k steps on them over three days, right out of the box. They are light, breathe well, and comfortable. Fit true to size and look great . For the price, you can’t beat them.

评论概述: Great for winter, horrible for summer.
评论详情: Don't get me wrong, these shoes are very comfortable, but since the mesh is thin and very breathable, it allows for odor to escape. I've only noticed this on warm/hot days. And I live in Southern California, so the majority of the year is warm. I don't recommend if you are prone to odor, even with foot deodorant. Somehow the deodorant doesn't work for these shoes.
Very comfortable and stylish shoes. Great for use all day at work or going out for all day events. Would shoes outfits that allow me to wear these shoes whenever I go out!

I bought these for my husband for his birthday. I was a little nervous about giving him brand new shoes for his birthday trip to a horse track, when I knew we'd be walking around a lot.  However, he said they were really comfortable the entire time.  They look really good too.  Better than the nasty slides he always wears! He did say that they fit a little big on him, even though I bought his normal size. However, with socks on too, he said they were just fine. He has bad bunions, and the mesh material worked well for him. They seem to be made very well.  Hopefully they won't get ruined before the new year! LOL

I wanted a pair of comfortable walking shoes and gave this brand a try.  They arrived on time and I was eager to put them on and did so right away.  I was pleasantly surprised how well they fit, not tight, just comfortable.  There is no adaption time to these shoes probably because they are woven cloth and adapt to your foot shape easily.  After wearing these shoes for a couple of days outdoors I decided that I would buy a second pair to be used only indoors, as they are more comfortable than my slippers.  The second pair arrived, and they have become my "house shoes".  One of the best purchases I have made for my feet.
Very nice casual shoes and comfortable
Extremely comfortable and you get that dressier look with gym shoe comfort.
Bought these for my brother and he absolutely loves them runs true to size. He wears a nine I bought a size 9 this is his second pair and he just loves them so comfortable.
After taking the correct measurements I got the exact size for me, they are very comfortable and perfect for walking long distances. Nice shoes
I like more of a rounded toe, the toe on these just looked so long and/or narrow.  Just didn’t like the look.  Other than that they were probably fine.
TBC..

These shoes have been wonderful, especially for the price. I bought these on sale expecting to throw them away, and they became my daily shoes. They look great, and the elastic makes it very easy to slide them on and off. I tied a firm knot on the top and only have to re-tie it every other week. Most importantly, they have been extremely comfortable and supportive. I walk around a lot, and I have not had any back pain wearing these shoes for over four months now. In fact, it led me to purchase two more varieties so I can wear them more often.  That said, the pattern does make it difficult to clean sometimes, and they don't have amazing traction. If you are often on slippery surfaces, I don't know why you'd be buying shoes like this anyway, but I cannot recommend them for that. For casual and light work purposes though, easily a top rating for me.
Cleaning can be tricky. The main idea is to maintain the white look. Careful when cleaning as the trim is brittle. It cracks and messes up the pristine whiteness look.
I like the comfort for wide feet. Sole and cushion could have been more but for the price this shoe is not bad.

These shoes pick us dirt that gets absorbed into the fibers and will  not wash out. however, they are extremely comfortable

Definitely one of the most comfortable shoes I’ve ever worn in my life! In the picture, they are 16 months old, they haven’t been cleaned. However, they are a pair of shoes you could throw in the washer, but I never did. Obviously they look a little rough so I just ordered another pair. I work 50 hours a week as a vendor so I do about 15,000 steps per day in these shoes. I have worn the souls and inserts out, but I haven’t replaced them and they’re still almost as comfortable as the first day I’ve worn them. The only downside is the traction so if you’re walking in a parking lot, definitely avoid the painted lines because you will slip and fall!
Holding up after a couple days at least. Comfortable and lightweight. They look nice enough to garner compliments. Will update if they fall apart within a couple of months.
I bought these for my son, he said Mom, it's like walking on a cloud!

I got these for work and now I want more of them because who knew these shoes were out there? Not me.  No joke, they are the most comfortable shoes I’ve ever worn. They are cushiony, breathable, the top is SO soft, and they just hug your feet so perfectly.  The material is thin and mesh though, so FORGET about wearing these outside while it’s raining unless you avoid every puddle and come to terms with having wet socks all day.  They were true to size, so I didn’t have to play the return game. The only complaint is that you will need to wear socks with these, preferably taller socks. I wore them one morning barefoot and they rub hard on the back of your heel. I put on some no-show socks later and noticed that the spot where the shoe was rubbing was slightly higher than where the socks were resting.
Nice fit, clean pleased

These are great shoes! The mesh sides and top make for a light weight and breathable shoe. They are very comfortable and a great price for $40ish bucks. I wear a 13 so finding shoes that fit can be difficult, these fit great as do the other pair of Bruno Marcs I bought.
Very light and usable.
